summary: This document details the items seized from Jeffrey Epstein during his arrest on July 6, 2019. It includes descriptions of digital devices collected by law enforcement, specifically an iPhone and an iPad, along with the individuals involved in the seizure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the central figure in this document, from whom items were seized during his arrest.

persons.name: Sean Watson
persons.context: Sean Watson approved the document detailing the items seized from Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Nicole Young
persons.context: Amanda Nicole Young drafted the document regarding the seizure of items from Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Wilson Byrne
persons.context: Paul Wilson Byrne was involved in the collection of items from Epstein during the arrest.

connections.description: Paul Wilson Byrne was involved in the seizure of items from Jeffrey Epstein during his arrest.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested, and items were seized from him at that time.

keyFacts: Items seized included a black iPhone and a silver iPad.
The seizure occurred on July 6, 2019, during Epstein's arrest.
The document was approved by SSA Sean Watson and drafted by Amanda Nicole Young.
